com.ubudu.indoorlocation

Class UbuduCoordinates2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.indoorlocation.UbuduCoordinates2D

  • public class UbuduCoordinates2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describing a 2D Geographic coordinates on Earth. The latitude can be in radians or degrees. Positive values indicate latitudes north of the equator. Negative values indicate latitudes south of the equator. The longitude can be in radians or degrees. Measurements are relative to the zero meridian, with positive values extending east of the meridian and negative values extending west of the meridian.

      • UbuduCoordinates2D

        public UbuduCoordinates2D(double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  boolean radians)
        Constructor. Coordinates may be given in radians or in degrees but it must be properly marked by boolean radians flag.
        Parameters:
        latitude - latitude coordinate
        longitude - longitude coordinate
        radians - true if the coordinates are given in radians, false if coordinates are given in degrees.
